main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported near Walnut Ridge Air Force Station, Arkansas, in March 1958, with various descriptions and observations including radar detection and multiple witnesses.
interesting points: One object was tracked on radar traveling at an estimated 1,500 knots,Visual observation attempted but no object seen despite radar confirmation, On March 29, 1958, a group of young men pursued a bright, glowing object described as 30 to 40 feet in diameter, The object was said to be surrounded by a bluish glow and moved rapidly before disappearing, The control tower operator reported an extremely bright greenish-white object moving rapidly on March 6, 1958.
witness description: A 24-year-old man, his younger brother, and friends reported the sighting while driving.
